author: RTÉ News
title: Coast Guard and RNLI ask public to stay at home
description: The Irish Coast Guard and RNLI are asking the public not to take part in any water-based activity on or in the sea or inland waters, while the current Covid-19 restrictions are in place.
content:
The Irish Coast Guard and RNLI are asking the public not to take part in any water-based activity on or in the sea or inland waters, while the current Covid-19 restrictions are in place.
